flawed_nl_solution:
His order came out to 7*200=$<<7*200=1400>>1400
So there was 1400-1000=$<<1400-1000=420>>420 that qualified for the discount
So his discount saved 420*0.1=$<<420*0.1=42>>42
So his purchase came out to 1400-42=$<<1400-42=1358>>1358
#### 1358

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 420. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
